website_summaries.verdict: This shade pops open to block 95% of sunlight, then collapses down to a package the size of a dinner plate.
pros: Outside is a silver-coated, radiant barrier system that reflects 95% of sunlight
cons: Tedious to put in place, but blocks a lot of heat even if you don't get it perfectly in place

customer_reviews.title: useless, doesn’t fit
customer_reviews.text: Would give 0 stars if possible, useless, doesn’t fit, doesn’t stay, impossible to fold up, the fact that this product exists is an insult to all mankind.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Not expensive and got the job done.
customer_reviews.text: Used it only once and when I went to my car it was surprisingly "cool" inside. Not cool as if the AC was on, obviously, but noticeably cooler than it was outside. All windows remained closed during the use of this sun shade. For those in *extremely* hot climates (I'm guessing Arizona in July, for example), I wouldn't consider a second sun shade for the rear windshield to be a bad idea. Haven't yet tried to pack it back into the bag it came with but hopefully I'll be able to do it. EDIT, 2019: folding it back is very easy; once done, it fits perfectly into the bag that came with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Nerdus Maximus

customer_reviews.title: Protect your dashboard and help reflect the sun. Folds and stores easy.
customer_reviews.text: I use to have the zigzag kind of sunshade but it missed a lot of blocking the sun out of the corners of the front window and also was a much bulkier item when it came to storing within the vehicle once I've folded it up to drive. This sunshade has been wonderful. You can cover the corners with the excess material flaps if you want. Folding it up is easy enough and I keep it stored between my passenger seat and my center console, which is great because that would be an otherwise useless and empty space that now has purpose!
customer_reviews.author: Tory Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Windshield Shade
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Windshield Shade! Very pleased! Easy to follow and clear sizing instructions, too! Fits my pickup truck windshield perfectly. The interior of my vehicle is dramatically, and noticeably cooler! It's definitely effective! Arrived well packaged. So effortless to place in windshield! Easy to fold up! Nice touch with the included storage pouch! A good value! Definitely recommend! I 5 Stars and thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: Great Shade Cover but Expect a Distinct Scent
customer_reviews.text: The large size fits my Honda Accord maybe not perfectly, but it covers it completely and snugly without using the visors. The only thing I wasn’t expecting was the really strong smell that came with it. I sprayed it with perfume as well as used my car freshener to help it. I’ve been using it for a week now and the smell seems to be disappearing. Since it does it’s job well, and the smell seems to be going away, I give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Don't rely on the make/model size chart!
customer_reviews.text: The large was recommended on the chart for my Hyundai Elantra - it was WAY WAY too big! There's so much clutter on the web page that it wasn't until later that I saw they recommended that you measure the window. Definitely do that before you order! I contacted the seller and they promptly refunded my money. I really wish it fit right - so far it seems to be a high-quality product and it keeps the car cooler than the plastic accordion-style ones.
customer_reviews.author: Arleen

customer_reviews.title: Happy after about a month
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. Guidelines told me to get a large for a 2017 Honda Accord, which kind of surprised me. The important thing is to get the height correct. There is a little extra fabric on either side, but that just easily wraps around past the windshield a little (extra coverage). It does a good job of covering all the way from the base of the windshield to the top where the car's sun visors hold it in place. I still haven't mastered folding it up yet. That part is a little awkward.
customer_reviews.author: justcuz

customer_reviews.title: Fit my Camry
customer_reviews.text: It Fits! I have tried more than one sun shade and the others were not tall enough to be held in place by my visors. This one fits my Camry and does a great job of keeping out the damaging sun. It opens easily, folds easily and even goes back in its pouch easily. Quality seems fine too. Glad I found it at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Reader Rabbit

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: "This product works as advertised. It fit my Toyota Sienna with its oversized windshield perfectly. It has kept my car cool in the hot Texas summer sun. It is a bit more expensive than some of the products that are similar in box stores but it appears more durable. Folding it can be tricky but with some practice you can fold it and put it away with its elastic strap in seconds. Great product."
customer_reviews.author: Eric McNair

customer_reviews.title: Runs true to size, yet get one larger than recommend
customer_reviews.text: a medium was recommended for my car, a 2005 Honda Pilot. After reading all the review I went with a large, and yes, they appear to run true to size yet I can definitely say I’m more happy with the large than I would have been with the suggested size. After getting this, a few family members have got one for their own car after seeing how nice it is. In summary, they run true to size, yet for me, getting a size larger than suggested was the way to go. It’s not a tough fit either. Just right.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Compact and easy: Yes
customer_reviews.text: Protection: It definitely shades your car's interior and protects your items from fading but it doesn't prevent your car's temperature from reaching 100 degrees on hot day. Compact and easy: Yes, it is easy to fold and store it in a compact manner. Size & Coverage: The size I got based on their table was right. However, the coverage isn't perfect unless I spend a lot of time fixing the corners (the parts that aren't supported by the wire) which can be inconvenient when you are in a hurry.
customer_reviews.author: Yayita

customer_reviews.title: I like it much more than I thought I would.  2018 F-150
customer_reviews.text: I had previously always used the folding type of sunscreens. When I traded in my Genesis sedan for an F-150, however, my $50 folding shade was a bit too small. I figured that. for the price, I'd give one of these a shot. I got the 65.7” x 36.4” version for my truck and, once I got used to the difference, it works quite nicely. After a while, it became easier to apply and remove than the folder. Once you learn the technique of how to fold this up for storage (there's a YouTube video), it's a snap.
customer_reviews.author: Linebacker--58

customer_reviews.title: Happy!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 2020 Corolla, and I am very happy with it. I followed the size suggestion and snagged the large. It’s a little big, but it shrinks down easy by overlapping the circles. I’d rather too big than too small. I am keeping the large. It seems to be doing the job. 😺
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: it is a little annoying to have to fold back
customer_reviews.text: made well and it keeps the inside of the car dark which is what i wanted. my husband has red leather interior and i didn't want sun damage on them. this definitely gets the job done. it is a little annoying to have to fold back, but you get the hang of it
customer_reviews.author: jennie

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, but make sure to measure.
customer_reviews.text: I should have measured, instead of going by the reviews I read, so it's a bit larger than might have been best, but it still works great! Nice coverage. Folds up easy for storage. I bought the large for a 2015 Lexus GS350. Medium would have been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: T.B.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit - tested on three cars
customer_reviews.text: Tested it out on three different size cars (full size truck, full size sedan, mid size sedan) and the fit was perfect. So I bought two more. I actually bought two different sun shades from amazon. The other one barely worked on one of the cars.
customer_reviews.author: Raman S.

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!!
customer_reviews.text: This sunscreen is perfect!! Well made and folds away so easily and compact. I’ve had mind for two years and I just got one for a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel Nunez

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised, but be aware...
customer_reviews.text: I've used these for years - they work great, as advertised. Be aware though, the "free product" they send with it is simply the storage pouch.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Fits and provides good coverage
customer_reviews.text: Got a Large size for a 2017 Toyota Camry. Fits well and is noticeably cooler. Wish it would include more info about dimensions - I made a lucky guess.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Lerma

customer_reviews.title: Necessary for southern summers
customer_reviews.text: Great product for summer time heat. Can definitely tell a difference when using vs without.
customer_reviews.author: Abbey P.

customer_reviews.title: Eh...
customer_reviews.text: I bought a double square sunshade that was perfect but degraded over the last 6 years so bought (2) of these as replacements. They work but sag in the top corners since they are double circles with excess material only. They work but take a lot more finagling then my old ones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 vehicles, a Ford Explorer and a Kia Sol. Following the size chart we ended up with a medium for the Kia and a large for the Ford both fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Geer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2000 camaro convertible and fits good and durable
customer_reviews.author: Cush

customer_reviews.title: Cooler vehicle
customer_reviews.text: Especially important in Florida since the sun is frequently still shining while it rains. Being one piece that opens easily makes it much easier to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah K Winn

customer_reviews.title: Best sunshade I’ve ever had.
customer_reviews.text: I got XL for my Ford Fiesta and it’s too big. It still does a great job and is easy to fold and store in the car. Works incredibly well— I’ve never had a sunshade work that well before.
customer_reviews.author: BurmeisterC

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with size
customer_reviews.text: Quality seems very good, but size is much larger than described. I bought it for my wife's RDX Acura and fits large. She rejected it and I'm using it in my car.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Rangel

customer_reviews.title: Live in AZ--Anything to beat the sun and heat!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit -- exactly what I needed -- great price >>BUY HERE<<
customer_reviews.author: Rick Young

customer_reviews.title: Works well for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price, and fits the windshield with only a few inches of overlap of the flexible metal frame rings.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Beck

customer_reviews.title: Good shade
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Works great and fits in my Chrysler town&country windshield. Nice to have the little case to keep it in when not being used.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Covered the windshield of my Ford F-250 and contracted into a surprisingly compact size.
customer_reviews.author: JNarc

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3, the large works great on the Dodge Ram, Jeep Cherokee and Suburban
customer_reviews.author: Eva Drozdowska

customer_reviews.title: A large fits the 2002 Expedition XLT windshield
customer_reviews.text: The large (65.7" x 36.4") Sun Shade fit my 2002 Expedition XLT perfectly. At the end of the day after sitting in the Texas heat, it now feels at least 10 degrees cooler, and the leather seats are more comfortable now too.
customer_reviews.author: TechGeek

customer_reviews.title: Size large fits Ford Edge
customer_reviews.text: Works amazing and keeps my Ford Edge cool! I got the large size.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie

customer_reviews.title: Good Product at a Fair Price
customer_reviews.text: The sun shade works well; keeps the car's interior noticeably cooler. Installation is a snap, and folding the shade for storage is easy after it's been done a time or two. All in all, a decent product for the reasonable cost.
customer_reviews.author: Cybergeezer

customer_reviews.title: It’s the best of it class
customer_reviews.text: Is the best one I have had. Even compared with more expensive ones. If it fits your car, this is the one you need
customer_reviews.author: CARLOS EDWIN

customer_reviews.title: Measure size of window to shade
customer_reviews.text: Using their suggestions on size, it fits my windshields on both cars like a glove and is easy to put up each day. Much better than the ones I originally had from another manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. G. F. Burdi Dc

customer_reviews.title: Too big- order size down
customer_reviews.text: Too big for my 2019 Toyota Corolla. I ordered using the chart but I would’ve gone a size smaller. Great quality and will do its job.
customer_reviews.author: DancinD

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, I highly recommend it, my car is cooler 😉
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to fold.
customer_reviews.text: This does the job, but is difficult to fold and I haven't been able to get it back to it's original shape since purchasing it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Good fitment and installation. Slight blemish.
customer_reviews.text: Good fitment and easy installation. One came with blemishes that isnt removable by rubbing with rag.
customer_reviews.author: C Pez

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: It seems to block out the sun pretty good and I noticed it keeps it cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Mark  R. Hornbuckle

customer_reviews.title: Small and easy to tuck away
customer_reviews.text: Like others have said, a little tricky to fold up (just keep twisting and you’ll get there!) but has worked well and fits my Honda Civic with size large. When folded, fits under the passenger seat and is tucked away.
customer_reviews.author: jesslaurel

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to get the right size for optimal protection
customer_reviews.text: I liked the size I used it in treeless parking lots anywhere where you notice the sun is streaming in the car
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Covers the whole windshield and so far has held up to all the twisting of putting in back in its pouch.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Y

customer_reviews.title: Well-made sun shade
customer_reviews.text: We needed a new sunshade for a new car. All the ones we found in local stores were flimsy. This is a sturdy, easy to fold shade that does the job in sunny Florida.
customer_reviews.author: Grammy M

customer_reviews.title: Decent — does it’s job
customer_reviews.text: Most effective if outside temperatures are below 95oF — anything higher and your car will still be hot It’s a shade, so it will do it’s job as a shade, meaning that your car will only gradually become hotter and not that it will be cool when you get in The shade is thin and rather low quality for the price, but definitely a must have for hot summer days
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Efficient with coverage and flexible
customer_reviews.text: I like the covering/reflecting quality of the windshield cover, which keeps my car cooler, and the portability with the bendable fold up wire. Windshield cover could be a bit smaller or attach better to fold down mirrors in cars.
customer_reviews.author: 422ce

customer_reviews.title: Texas sun
customer_reviews.text: Works well to guard against the Texas sun on a Chevy Equinox.
customer_reviews.author: IFixx

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: Does the job and keeps my black interior not as hot. Lovely
customer_reviews.author: Mom-of-twins

customer_reviews.title: So good I bought 3
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I started of with one and then bought another for my dad and he loved it and decided to buy one for my mom. Definitely recommend it to everyone. Literally an every day use for me and my family.
customer_reviews.author: Hector

customer_reviews.title: Fits 2018 Altima
customer_reviews.text: The size i got fits my 2018 Nissan Altima perfectly
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits great to cover the entire windshield on my F150.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Adam Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Folds up well
customer_reviews.text: Folds up small and fits my Lexus RX350 very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get the right size for your car
customer_reviews.text: This thing is HUGE. Not for cars with a low profile windshield. I’m sure it works as advertised, great materials used in manufacturing. Just too big for my car.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon L

customer_reviews.title: How do you fold this?
customer_reviews.text: Covers full windshield but almost impossible to fold back up. Needs instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Greg S

customer_reviews.title: Great Shade
customer_reviews.text: Great shade. Haven’t quite gotten the hang of the fold, but am confident that will come.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Too bulky & cumbersum
customer_reviews.text: Unlike individual sun blocker, this is too cumbersome & limber.
customer_reviews.author: James V. Peters

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful sun shade
customer_reviews.text: A bit hard to fold up, but overall perfect for my car!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Kruley

customer_reviews.title: Recommend, does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly fine, easy to fold and store — great results!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you measure your windshield to get the right size. This is EXACTLY what I wanted and couldn't find in any stores. It perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended size incorrect
customer_reviews.text: The guide recommended a large for my 2019 Camry. It is definitely too large. Recommended size may not be correct for all cars
customer_reviews.author: stacey l keller

customer_reviews.title: Fits well. Large on 2021 Kia Sportage
customer_reviews.text: Hard to fold, didn’t notice a much extra cooling indoors
customer_reviews.author: Babsy

customer_reviews.title: Very happy and just in time with this super hot weather
customer_reviews.text: Fit well! Very happy and just in time with this super hot weather!
customer_reviews.author: Alice(ABM)

customer_reviews.title: Its okay for sun protection not heat.
customer_reviews.text: It is okay. I don't really think it decreases the heat in my car too much. At this point I am just using it to protect my leather seats from the sun. I purchased the recommended size for my RX350 ams it is too big for the windshield.
customer_reviews.author: K.W.

customer_reviews.title: It does it’s job but not the easiest to use
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok but I feel a few design opportunities. It does shield the sun but it takes a bit of finesse to get full dash / windshield coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: I bought mine a bit bigger, but no problem. It does as it describes.
customer_reviews.author: Drkangel

customer_reviews.title: Great sunshade
customer_reviews.text: Use this product in a 2012 Chrysler 300. Fits like it was made for it. Works like a champ
customer_reviews.author: Foxie

customer_reviews.title: Auto Sunshade review
customer_reviews.text: Product works as advertised. Opens and folds easily. Somewhat difficult to put back in holding bag so I just fold and place between seats for easy access.
customer_reviews.author: Jim CP

customer_reviews.title: Wish it worked better
customer_reviews.text: It got bent after a few uses and wouldn’t fold how it was supposed to again. It didn’t feel much cooler in the car when used.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina P

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Kinda flimsy, not easy to fold. For the price, it is what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and perfect fit for my Infiniti G37
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great and folds up really easily. Just put the elastic around it once folded and it stays put! Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered for my 2010 Ford Fusion according to size chart and it is way too short and won't stay up in the window. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: laurel

customer_reviews.title: It protected
customer_reviews.text: This fit my car perfectly! I’m happy with the sun shade🙂
customer_reviews.author: cynthia T

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I like that you can order different sizes and there is a chart of autos that shows which size fits
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Powell

customer_reviews.title: Sizing guide is inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: The size guide is inaccurate. A large is recommended for 2011 Honda Civics, but it did not fit my car.
customer_reviews.author: Live.Laugh.Love.

customer_reviews.title: Keep that sun out.
customer_reviews.text: So it was hard to find the exact measurements for my car, but I ended up buying the XL of this for my 2018 WRX. It was a little too big, but it does cover the windows. Maybe the large would've worked, but I don't feel like going through the hassle of returning a product then finding out the large is too small. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: kevinKIKU

product_meta.title: Shade-It Car Windshield Sun Shade + Free Product Durable 210T Nylon Polyester Heat Block & UV Protection Sunshades - Sunlight Blocker - Reflective Coating, Easy Storage Sunshade (Large 63.5" x 33.75")
feature_bullets: ► 𝗗𝗨𝗥𝗔𝗕𝗟𝗘 𝗣𝗥𝗘𝗠𝗜𝗨𝗠 𝗤𝗨𝗔𝗟𝗜𝗧𝗬: Our sunshades are made from premium quality 210T reflective polyester material, other brands use cheaper 170T/190T material. Our sunshades at 210T are higher density and stronger then most others, it's double-stitched with sturdy metal rings that maintain the shade's integrity and shape. Plus, it’s nearly tear-proof, with high-quality materials and a strong frame, our sun shade has you covered.

► 𝗦𝗨𝗣𝗘𝗥𝗜𝗢𝗥 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗧𝗘𝗖𝗧𝗜𝗢𝗡: Shade-It is one of the top in it's class for full-coverage and perfect fit. The outside is a silver-coated, radiant barrier system that effectively reflects 99% of sunlight. It’s made-to-fit design provides protection from Sun, UV and heat build up that fade and overheat the inside of your car.

► 𝗖𝗢𝗠𝗣𝗔𝗖𝗧 𝗔𝗡𝗗 𝗘𝗔𝗦𝗬 𝗧𝗢 𝗦𝗧𝗢𝗥𝗘: Sunshade easily pops out and folds back in seconds, Our car window shade comes with a free carrying case, store your shade in your glove compartment, center console, or side door.

►𝗦𝗜𝗭𝗘𝗗 𝗙𝗢𝗥 𝗣𝗘𝗥𝗙𝗘𝗖𝗧 𝗖𝗢𝗩𝗘𝗥𝗔𝗚𝗘: Many car sun-shades are one-size-fits-all. This leads to sunshades being too big or too small, causing light to sneak through and defeat the purpose. Our sunshades come in a variety of sizes. Our sunshades fit most sedans, trucks, SUV & Minivan. Find your vehicle in the size chart.
► 𝗥𝗜𝗦𝗞 𝗙𝗥𝗘𝗘 𝗣𝗨𝗥𝗖𝗛𝗔𝗦𝗘: Shade-It offers a Money Back or Free Replacement Guarantee, if the product does not fit or you're not 100% Satisfied!
